member.name: P:DotSpatial.Tools.TextStrings.Selectthetypeofneighborhood
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Select the type of neighborhood to use when searching for point. 

Fixed Distance: Searches a set distance from a cell for points and uses all of the points that are found to compute a cells value. If there are less points collected then the minimum specified the search radius is expanded until there are suffcient points found. 

Fixed Count: Searches for the closest points to the cell until the max number of points specified is reached or the maximum distance is reached..

The shapefile that the polygon sections will be saved to.
member.returns: False if errors were encountered or an assumption violated, true otherwise.

The polygon being checked for intersection.
The file where new polygon sections should be saved to.
